## Who am I?

My name is Karsten Maurer.  I am originally from the Twin Cities area of Minnesota. I am now an assistant professor of statistics at Miami University in Oxford, Ohio. I completed my doctoral degree in statistics at Iowa State University. My research interests are in the fields of predictive modeling, data visualization and statistics education.  

## What classes do I mostly teach?

* STA 404/504 - Advanced Data Visualization
* STA 467/567 - Statistical Learning
